mapper.update: UPDATE reserve r INNER JOIN room ro ON r.room_no = ro.room_no SET r.reserve_use = '이용 완료' WHERE r.reserve_use = '이용 중' AND r.reserve_check_out = CURDATE() AND CURTIME() > ro.room_check_out
UPDATE reserve r INNER JOIN room ro ON r.room_no = ro.room_no SET r.reserve_use = '이용 중' WHERE r.reserve_use = '이용 전' AND r.reserve_check_in = CURDATE() AND CURTIME() > ro.room_check_in
mapper.select: SELECT re.reserve_no, m.member_name, ac.accom_name, r.room_name, p.payment_method, p.payment_price, re.reserve_use, re.reserve_cancel_date, re.reserve_info, re.reserve_personnel, re.reserve_date, re.reserve_cancel_date, re.reserve_check_in, re.reserve_check_out FROM reserve re LEFT JOIN payment p ON p.reserve_no = re.reserve_no LEFT JOIN member m ON re.member_no = m.member_no LEFT JOIN room r ON r.room_no = re.room_no LEFT JOIN accom ac ON r.accom_no = ac.accom_no WHERE re.reserve_no = #{reserveNo};
